home.heading: Title
home.title: A Clever Way
home.subtitle: To Live In Hotels
home.home_summary: At HotelApartments, we offer extended stays in fully furnished and serviced apartments worldwide.
home.home_subheader: Browse HotelApartments.com, the global destination for fully serviced hotel apartment and villa extended stays.
home.home_search_where: Where do you want to stay?
home.home_search_placeholder: Type the City, Area or Hotel name
home.bookus_subtitle: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipis elit
home.bespoke_designs_subtitle: Explore our handpicked selection of exclusive serviced apartments and villas, tailored for business and leisure travelers across the globe.
home.cost_effective_subtitle: Discover smarter, cost-effective, and comfortable hotel apartments perfect for extended stays, business trips, and leisure getaways and enjoy 30% more space.
home.corporate_experiences_subtitle: Elevate your productivity with dedicated workspaces, complimentary access to on-site business centers, meeting rooms, and a variety of dining options—all designed to enhance your work trip.
home.inclusive_stays_subtitle: Experience fully serviced apartments with equipped kitchens, all-inclusive bills, and a range of amenities, ensuring you have everything you need for any trip.
home.customer_support_subtitle: Get direct assistance from our representative from booking to check-in to check-out, ensuring a hassle-free experience for all your travel needs
home.flexible_contracts_subtitle: Monthly or yearly stays with flexible contracts, offering easy extensions and cancellations for your evolving travel plans.
home.citylist_text_subtitle: Browse through a hand-picked selection of Top Destinations across the Globe including the Middle East, Europe, Asia and America. We pride ourselves on offering an extensive and diverse database of properties that cater to all your needs. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, seeking a short-term or long-term stay, our platform is your go-to destination for finding the perfect serviced apartment that matches your preferences.
home.partnership_text_subtitle: Partnered with top hotels, apartments, and villas worldwide, HotelApartments.com find you the ultimate match, allowing you to fully immerse yourself at your new destination.
home.seasonal_offers_text: Dedicated experts secure the best available rates from partner hotels, ensuring you maximize your city trips with timely offers and maximum discounts.
home.business_on_go_text: Enjoy a seamless "business on the go" experience. Gain exclusive access to on-site amenities encompassing lifestyle, wellness, and essential corporate facilities, designed to meet specific business travel needs.
home.trusted_by_subtitle: A wide selection of globally recognized partners
home.wide_range_choice_subtitle: Browse through a carefully selected list of top hotel apartments worldwide, including the Middle East, Europe, Asia, and America. We take pride in offering a diverse selection of serviced apartments and villas that meet all your needs. Whether you're traveling for work or leisure extended stays, Hotel Apartments will help you find the perfect place that suits your preferences. Your comfort is our priority, and our dedicated team is here to assist you every step of the way.
home.fully_accomodation_subtitle: Be it business or leisure, our carefully chosen accommodations guarantee a comfortable haven for your stay.

footer.summary: HotelApartments.com is a trusted partner for exceptional accommodations, whether you're traveling for business or leisure. Discover the perfect stay with our selection of fully serviced apartments, villas, and corporate housing, and experience comfort and convenience in every destination.

corporate_customers.title: Corporate Customers
corporate_customers.about_us_text: Corporate Housing is a temporary housing solution that offers extended stays in the city with access to fully furnished apartments and villas. The apartments are especially ideal for frequent travelers and corporates, as it offers them the homely ambience of a residential unit, with the added perks of flexibility and comfort. In comparison to regular hotels, serviced apartments are also preferred as they provide more space, lower rates with access to all hotel benefits and full services.

corporate_customers.header_title: Book your Corporate Stays with HotelApartments.com
corporate_customers.header_subtitle: Get fully serviced business accommodations for productive business trips
corporate_customers.for_business_1: Experience the difference with HotelApartments.com. We understand the unique demands of your corporate travel. Our corporate housing solutions are designed to simplify your experience, offering a streamlined and efficient stay.
corporate_customers.for_business_2: HotelApartments.com offers all-inclusive packages that ensure you have everything you need right at your fingertips. No need to worry about the details – we've got it covered. From fully equipped spaces to convenient amenities, we make your extended business travel both productive and enjoyable.
corporate_customers.for_business_3: As industry leaders, we set the bar high for excellence in corporate housing. We offer top-tier options in prime locations worldwide, ensuring your team has the ideal environment to excel.
corporate_customers.how_to: How to Become Our Corporate Customer
corporate_customers.step2: Our team will promptly verify your corporate credentials.
corporate_customers.step3_text: Connect with your dedicated relationship manager to discuss your specific needs.
corporate_customers.step4_text: Gain access to exclusive corporate deals tailored to your requirements.
corporate_customers.step4_text1: Discover the future of corporate hospitality with HotelApartments.com – where we simplify, elevate, and inspire your corporate stays. Your success is our commitment.

about_us.info1: Rent Furnished Apartments in Dubai. Our selection of serviced apartments is perfectly suited for those seeking long-term accommodation with flexible rental terms. Rest assured that you will always find your ideal living space with us. All our rentals are available for monthly stays, providing you with a hassle-free and convenient living experience.
about_us.info3: Look no further than our range of stunning apartments for rent. Dubai is renowned for its sun-soaked climate, international business opportunities, and world-class shopping experiences. Whether you're relocating to Dubai for work or planning an extended stay, Hotel Apartments offers a range of furnished apartment rentals to suit all needs. From studio apartments to three-bedroom homes, our properties are located in the most desirable towers across Dubai, from Downtown to the Marina and JBR to DIFC. Our user-friendly search site allows you to easily filter and sort by dates, amenities, and price, ensuring you find the perfect apartment for your needs.
about_us.info4: Our apartments are fully furnished with modern interiors, top-notch amenities, and fully-equipped kitchens, making it the ideal home-away-from-home for your extended stay. All our properties are sanitized to the highest standard before every new check-in, ensuring your safety at all times. Our local support team and the Hotel Apartments Guest App are available to assist you with anything you may need during your stay, making your experience seamless and stress-free. With flexible booking contracts and no broker fees, Hotel Apartments’ flats for rent in Dubai are the perfect solution for your accommodation needs.

for_hotels.person1_text: Working with HotelApartments.com has been a truly rewarding experience for our business. Their dedication, professionalism, and commitment to excellence have made a significant impact on our hotel’s growth and success. From the moment we started our partnership, HotelApartments.com demonstrated a deep understanding of our product. They took the time to learn about our hotel’s unique features, target audience, and goals. This personalized approach allowed them to create tailor-made solutions that perfectly matched our needs with the guest’s. Their comprehensive knowledge of market trends and pricing strategies has been invaluable in optimizing our revenue management.
for_hotels.person2: Christine Khachatryan, Avani+ Palm View Dubai Hotel & Suites

experience.title: Experience
experience.area_orientation_text1: Embarking on a new chapter in a different city can be both exciting and overwhelming. Our Area Orientation service offers employees a comprehensive guide to their new surroundings. From discovering the best local eateries and markets to understanding the nuances of different neighborhoods, HotelApartments.com provide an in-depth understanding of their new community. By experiencing the locale firsthand, employees can integrate more swiftly and comfortably into their new environment.

experience.home_search_text1: Finding the perfect home is not just about a place to live; it's about creating a space where employees can thrive. HotelApartments.com ensures your employees have a comfortable and temporary home while they embark on their search for the ideal residence. This means minimal disruption and peace of mind during the often-chaotic process of house-hunting.

experience.school_search_text1: For employees relocating with their families, we understand that ensuring the right education for their children is paramount. HotelApartments.com School Search service assists in identifying the most suitable educational institutions for their kids. We take into account factors such as curricula, extracurricular activities, and the overall learning environment to guarantee a seamless academic transition, so families can confidently embrace their new community.

experience.settling_in_text1: The process of settling into a new city often involves navigating a maze of administrative tasks, from local registrations to setting up essential services. HotelApartments.com simplifies this journey, ensuring employees can focus on what truly matters. Our service takes care of these logistics, allowing your employees to hit the ground running in their new environment.

HotelApartments.com assists employees in finding not only a home but also a neighborhood that welcomes their four-legged friends. Our service ensures that pets are not just accommodated but also happy and comfortable in the new environment, fostering a smooth transition for the entire family.

experience.concierge_services_text1: Our Concierge Services are designed to enhance the overall employee experience when you trust us with destination services. From managing day-to-day household tasks to coordinating transportation needs, we offer comprehensive support. This means that employees can focus on their professional roles and personal well-being, with the assurance that their needs are taken care of, ensuring a stress-free and productive relocation.

experience.icst_text1: Adjusting to a new environment is not just about knowing the physical landscape; it's about building meaningful connections with colleagues and neighbors. Our Intercultural Solutions and Training equips employees with the skills and insights needed to not only adapt but thrive. This means building productive relationships with co-workers and creating a sense of belonging in their new community.
experience.icst_text2: Mattis vulputate amet non feugiat non ornare at etiam. Purus ut aliquet penatibus vitae non auctor natoque faucibus. Imperdiet lectus sociis molestie proin integer fusce.
experience.visual_immigration_text1: Navigating the often complex and daunting procedures of visa and immigration requirements is a crucial part of any relocation process. HotelApartments.com simplifies this journey by handling everything from the initial document processing to visa renewals, ensuring that employees remain in compliance with local regulations. This expertise empowers your employees to confidently transition to their new destination, knowing that their immigration requirements are expertly managed.
experience.visual_immigration_text2: Mattis vulputate amet non feugiat non ornare at etiam. Purus ut aliquet penatibus vitae non auctor natoque faucibus. Imperdiet lectus sociis molestie proin integer fusce.
experience.testimonal1_text: HotelApartments.com made our team’s international move incredibly smooth. Their expert team guided the whole team through the visa and immigration process, and their local knowledge was invaluable in finding the perfect neighborhood. We couldn't have asked for a better destination partner.
experience.testimonal2_text: I was worried about finding the right school for my children when we relocated, but HotelApartments.com's school search service put my mind at ease. They found an excellent school for my kids, making our transition much more comfortable and worry-free.
experience.testimonal3_text: Moving with our pets was a challenge, but HotelApartments.com was there every step of the way. They not only found a pet-friendly neighborhood but also helped us with the paperwork and other necessities. Our furry family members are happy, and so are we!
experience.testimonal4_text: HotelApartments.com has been our only choice for our corporate housing needs whenever we are in the UAE. They understood what we, as business travelers, needed and consistently delivered the perfect villa match for our team where we had workstations, meeting spaces and so many other amenities. Our team has been their guest for 3 times and let me tell you, they never disappoint.
experience.testimonal5_text: This was my second destination where I could choose HotelApartments.com for my business accommodation booking. Since they knew my requirements already, I found a perfect spot to be in for this business trip. Now that I’ve found out that they’re operating at my third location too, guess who I’m going to choose?
experience.testimonal6_text: For my very first business trip, I chose HotelApartments.com, and I couldn't have made a better decision. Their team understood my needs as a business traveler right from the start. The apartment that they provided had everything I required, from workspaces to essential amenities. HotelApartments.com made my first business trip a smooth and productive experience.
experience.testimonal7_text: I must highlight the exceptional value for money offered by your service. Not only did we receive outstanding assistance in securing the best accommodation option, but we also received competitive rates that perfectly aligned with our budgetary considerations, another amazing thing was the flexibility of payment, there was no pressure to make the payment immediately, usually we don’t have this flexibility with other service providers.
experience.testimonal8_text: HotelApartments.com has been our only choice for our corporate housing needs whenever our partners are in the UAE. They understood what we needed, and consistently delivered the perfect hotel apartment matching our requirements. Our partners have been their guest 3 times and let me tell you, they never disappoint.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content1: This privacy policy has been compiled to better serve those who are concerned with how their ‘Personally identifiable information’ (PII) is being used online. PII, as used in US privacy law and information security, is information that can be used on its own or with other information to identify, contact, or locate a single person, or to identify an individual in context. Please read our privacy policy carefully to get a clear understanding of how we collect, use, protect or otherwise handle your Personally Identifiable Information in accordance with our website.
privacy_policy.content2: What personal information do we collect from the people that visit our blog, website or app? When ordering or registering on our site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your name, email address, mailing address, phone number or other details to help you with your experience.
privacy_policy.content3: When do we collect information? We collect information from you when you register on our site, place an order, subscribe to a newsletter, fill out a form List a Property or enter information on our site.
privacy_policy.content4: How do we use your information? We may use the information we collect from you when you register, make a purchase, sign up for our newsletter, respond to a survey or marketing communication, surf the website, or use certain other site features in the following ways: To personalize user’s experience and to allow us to deliver the type of content and product offerings in which you are most interested. To improve our website in order to better serve you. To allow us to better service you in responding to your customer service requests. To administer a contest, promotion, survey or other site feature. To quickly process your transactions. To send periodic emails regarding your order or other products and services.
privacy_policy.content5: How do we protect visitor information? We do not use vulnerability scanning and/or scanning to PCI standards. We do not use Malware Scanning.
privacy_policy.content6: Your personal information is contained behind secured networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights to such systems, and are required to keep the information confidential. In addition, all sensitive/credit information you supply is encrypted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology. We implement a variety of security measures when a user places an order enters, submits, or accesses their information to maintain the safety of your personal information. All transactions are processed through a gateway provider and are not stored or processed on our servers.
privacy_policy.content7: Do we use ‘cookies’? Yes. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer’s hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow) that enables the site’s or service provider’s systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. For instance, we use cookies to help us remember and process the items in your shopping cart. They are also used to help us understand your preferences based on previous or current site activity, which enables us to provide you with improved services. We also use cookies to help us compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future.
privacy_policy.content9: Help remember and process the items in the shopping cart.
privacy_policy.content10: Compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interactions in order to offer better site experiences and tools in the future.
privacy_policy.content11: We may also use trusted third party services that track this information on our behalf.
privacy_policy.content12: You can choose to have your computer warn you each time a cookie is being sent, or you can choose to turn off all cookies.
privacy_policy.content13: You do this through your browser (like Internet Explorer) settings.
privacy_policy.content14: Each browser is a little different, so look at your browser’s Help menu to learn the correct way to modify your cookies.
privacy_policy.content15: If you disable cookies off, some features will be disabled It won’t affect the users experience that make your site experience more efficient and some of our services will not function properly. However, you can still place orders .
privacy_policy.content16: Third Party Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information unless we provide you with advance notice. This does not include website hosting partners and other parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others’ rights, property, or safety.
privacy_policy.content17: However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.
privacy_policy.content18: Third party links Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third party products or services on our website. These third party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and welcome any feedback about these sites.
privacy_policy.content19: Google Google’s advertising requirements can be summed up by Google’s Advertising Principles. They are put in place to provide a positive experience for users.
privacy_policy.content20: We use Google AdSense Advertising on our website. Google, as a third party vendor, uses cookies to serve ads on our site. Google’s use of the DART cookie enables it to serve ads to our users based on their visit to our site and other sites on the Internet. Users may opt out of the use of the DART cookie by visiting the Google ad and content network privacy policy.
privacy_policy.content24: We along with third-party vendors, such as Google use first-party cookies (such as the Google Analytics cookies) and third-party cookies (such as the DoubleClick cookie) or other third-party identifiers together to compile data regarding user interactions with ad impressions, and other ad service functions as they relate to our website.
privacy_policy.content25: Opting out: Users can set preferences for how Google advertises to you using the Google Ad Settings page. Alternatively, you can opt out by visiting the Network Advertising initiative opt out page or permanently using the Google Analytics Opt Out Browser add on.
privacy_policy.content26: California Online Privacy Protection Act CalOPPA is the first state law in the nation to require commercial websites and online services to post a privacy policy. The law’s reach stretches well beyond California to require a person or company in the United States (and conceivably the world) that operates websites collecting personally identifiable information from California consumers to post a conspicuous privacy policy on its website stating exactly the information being collected and those individuals with whom it is being shared, and to comply with this policy. – See more at:
privacy_policy.content27: According to CalOPPA we agree to the following:
privacy_policy.content28: Users can visit our site anonymously
privacy_policy.content29: Once this privacy policy is created, we will add a link to it on our home page, or as a minimum on the first significant page after entering our website.
privacy_policy.content30: Our Privacy Policy link includes the word ‘Privacy’, and can be easily be found on the page specified above.
privacy_policy.content31: Users will be notified of any privacy policy changes:
privacy_policy.content32: On our Privacy Policy Page Users are able to change their personal information: – By emailing us – By logging in to their account – By chatting with us or sending us a ticket
privacy_policy.content33: How does our site handle do not track signals?We honor do not track signals and do not track, plant cookies, or use advertising when a Do Not Track (DNT) browser mechanism is in place.
privacy_policy.content34: Does our site allow third party behavioral tracking? – No, it doesn’t. It’s also important to note that we do not allow third party behavioral tracking.
privacy_policy.content35: COPPA (Children Online Privacy Protection Act) When it comes to the collection of personal information from children under 13, the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) puts parents in control. The Federal Trade Commission, the nation’s consumer protection agency, enforces the COPPA Rule, which spells out what operators of websites and online services must do to protect children’s privacy and safety online.
privacy_policy.content36: We do not specifically market to children under 13.
privacy_policy.content37: Fair Information Practices The Fair Information Practices Principles form the backbone of privacy law in the United States and the concepts they include have played a significant role in the development of data protection laws around the globe. Understanding the Fair Information Practice Principles and how they should be implemented is critical to comply with the various privacy laws that protect personal information.
privacy_policy.content38: In order to be in line with Fair Information Practices we will take the following responsive action, should a data breach occur:
privacy_policy.content39: We will notify the users via email
privacy_policy.content40: Within 7 business days We will notify the users via in site notification
privacy_policy.content42: We also agree to the individual redress principle, which requires that individuals have a right to pursue legally enforceable rights against data collectors and processors who fail to adhere to the law. This principle requires not only that individuals have enforceable rights against data users, but also that individuals have recourse to courts or a government agency to investigate and/or prosecute non-compliance by data processors.
privacy_policy.content43: CAN SPAM Act The CAN-SPAM Act is a law that sets the rules for commercial email, establishes requirements for commercial messages, gives recipients the right to have emails stopped from being sent to them, and spells out tough penalties for violations. We collect your email address in order to:
privacy_policy.content44: Send information, respond to inquiries, and/or other requests or questions.
privacy_policy.content45: Process orders and to send information and updates pertaining to orders
privacy_policy.content46: We may also send you additional information related to your product and/or service.
privacy_policy.content47: Market to our mailing list or continue to send emails to our clients after the original transaction has occurred
privacy_policy.content48: To be in accordance with CANSPAM we agree to the following:
privacy_policy.content49: NOT use false, or misleading subjects or email addresses
privacy_policy.content50: Identify the message as an advertisement in some reasonable way
privacy_policy.content51: Include the physical address of our business or site headquarters
privacy_policy.content52: Monitor third party email marketing services for compliance, if one is used.
privacy_policy.content54: Allow users to unsubscribe by using the link at the bottom of each email
privacy_policy.content55: If at any time you would like to unsubscribe from receiving future emails, you can email us at – Follow the instructions at the bottom of each email. and we will promptly remove you from ALL correspondence.
privacy_policy.content56: Changes to Privacy Policy and Terms
privacy_policy.content57: Our Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions may be changed or updated occasionally to meet the requirements and standards. Therefore Customers are encouraged to frequently visit these sections in order to be updated about the changes on the website. Modifications will be effective on the day they are posted.
privacy_policy.content59: All our transactions are proudly processed through CCAvenue payment gateway. All credit/debit cards details / information are NOT stored with us, sold, shared, rented or leased to any third parties.
privacy_policy.content61: Per DTCM regulations, we are required to collect, submit and store copies of your passport/identification document as well as all accompanying guests at all times. Such copies are securely stored with us and will never be sold, shared or leased to any third parties (except governmental and policing authorities wherever officially requested from us).

refund_policy.title: Refund Policy
refund_policy.content1: In order to cancel a booking made through our website, in-person, phone call or our partner channels, you must send to us a written notice of cancellation email as follows:
refund_policy.content2: Written notice to be sent from your registered email address (if any) to info@hotelapartments.com
refund_policy.content3: Clear instruction/request to cancel the reservation.
refund_policy.content4: For all reservations originating from travel agencies – such requests shall be made via respective partner channel only.
refund_policy.content5: Please note, below general cancellation/refund rules apply to all reservations unless otherwise agreed in written between the Guest and the Operator.
refund_policy.content6: Request is received at least 30-nights prior to check-in date
refund_policy.content7: Full Refund less administrative charges of AED 300
refund_policy.content8: No refund if you cancel less than 30 days before check-in
refund_policy.content9: Operator reserves the right to keep security deposit / down-payment / reservation fee / rental amount against the cancellation to cover full charges as shown above.
refund_policy.content10: By making a reservation all our Guests agree to:
refund_policy.content13: Request is received less than 30-nights prior to check-in date

tandc_policy.title: Terms & Conditions
tandc_policy.content1: These terms and conditions (“Terms”, “Agreement”) are an agreement between Website Operator (“Website Operator”, “us”, “we” or “our”) and you (“User”, “you” or “your”). This Agreement sets forth the general terms and conditions of your use of the servicedapartments.ae website and any of its products or services (collectively, “Website” or “Services”).
tandc_policy.content2: We are not responsible for Content residing on the Website. In no event shall we be held liable for any loss of any Content. It is your sole responsibility to maintain appropriate backup of your Content. Notwithstanding the foregoing, on some occasions and in certain circumstances, with absolutely no obligation, we may be able to restore some or all of your data that has been deleted as of a certain date and time when we may have backed up data for our own purposes. We make no guarantee that the data you need will be available.
tandc_policy.content3: Although this Website may link to other websites, we are not, directly or indirectly, implying any approval, association, sponsorship, endorsement, or affiliation with any linked website, unless specifically stated herein. We are not responsible for examining or evaluating, and we do not warrant the offerings of, any businesses or individuals or the content of their websites. We do not assume any responsibility or liability for the actions, products, services, and content of any other third-parties. You should carefully review the legal statements and other conditions of use of any website which you access through a link from this Website. Your linking to any other off-site websites is at your own risk.
tandc_policy.content4: In addition to other terms as set forth in the Agreement, you are prohibited from using the Website or its Content: (a) for any unlawful purpose; (b) to solicit others to perform or participate in any unlawful acts; (c) to violate any international, federal, provincial or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances; (d) to infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others; (e) to harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate based on gender, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, race, age, national origin, or disability; (f) to submit false or misleading information; (g) to upload or transmit viruses or any other type of malicious code that will or may be used in any way that will affect the functionality or operation of the Service or of any related website, other websites, or the Internet; (h) to collect or track the personal information of others; (i) to spam, phish, pharm, pretext, spider, crawl, or scrape; (j) for any obscene or immoral purpose; or (k) to interfere with or circumvent the security features of the Service or any related website, other websites, or the Internet. We reserve the right to terminate your use of the Service or any related website for violating any of the prohibited uses.
tandc_policy.content5: This Agreement does not transfer to you any intellectual property owned by Website Operator or third-parties, and all rights, titles, and interests in and to such property will remain (as between the parties) solely with Website Operator. All trademarks, service marks, graphics and logos used in connection with our Website or Services, are trademarks or registered trademarks of Website Operator or Website Operator licensors. Other trademarks, service marks, graphics and logos used in connection with our Website or Services may be the trademarks of other third-parties. Your use of our Website and Services grants you no right or license to reproduce or otherwise use any Website Operator or third-party trademarks.
tandc_policy.content6: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, in no event will Website Operator, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, agents, suppliers or licensors be liable to any person for (a): any indirect, incidental, special, punitive, cover or consequential damages (including, without limitation, damages for lost profits, revenue, sales, goodwill, use of content, impact on business, business interruption, loss of anticipated savings, loss of business opportunity) however caused, under any theory of liability, including, without limitation, contract, tort, warranty, breach of statutory duty, negligence or otherwise, even if Website Operator has been advised as to the possibility of such damages or could have foreseen such damages. To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, the aggregate liability of Website Operator and its affiliates, officers, employees, agents, suppliers and licensors, relating to the services will be limited to an amount greater of one dollar or any amounts actually paid in cash by you to Website Operator for the prior one month period prior to the first event or occurrence giving rise to such liability. The limitations and exclusions also apply if this remedy does not fully compensate you for any losses or fails of its essential purpose.
tandc_policy.content7: You agree to indemnify and hold Website Operator and its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, and agents harmless from and against any liabilities, losses, damages or costs, including reasonable attorneys’ fees, incurred in connection with or arising from any third-party allegations, claims, actions, disputes, or demands asserted against any of them as a result of or relating to your Content, your use of the Website or Services or any willful misconduct on your part.
tandc_policy.content8: All rights and restrictions contained in this Agreement may be exercised and shall be applicable and binding only to the extent that they do not violate any applicable laws and are intended to be limited to the extent necessary so that they will not render this Agreement illegal, invalid or unenforceable. If any provision or portion of any provision of this Agreement shall be held to be illegal, invalid or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction, it is the intention of the parties that the remaining provisions or portions thereof shall constitute their agreement with respect to the subject matter hereof, and all such remaining provisions or portions thereof shall remain in full force and effect.
tandc_policy.content9: The formation, interpretation, and performance of this Agreement and any disputes arising out of it shall be governed by the substantive and procedural laws of Dubai, United Arab Emirates without regard to its rules on conflicts or choice of law and, to the extent applicable, the laws of United Arab Emirates. The exclusive jurisdiction and venue for actions related to the subject matter hereof shall be the state and federal courts located in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, and you hereby submit to the personal jurisdiction of such courts. You hereby waive any right to a jury trial in any proceeding arising out of or related to this Agreement. The United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods does not apply to this Agreement.
tandc_policy.content10: We reserve the right to modify this Agreement or its policies relating to the Website or Services at any time, effective upon posting of an updated version of this Agreement on the Website. When we do, we will post a notification on the main page of our Website. Continued use of the Website after any such changes shall constitute your consent to such changes.
tandc_policy.content11: You acknowledge that you have read this Agreement and agree to all its terms and conditions. By using the Website or its Services you agree to be bound by this Agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the terms of this Agreement, you are not authorized to use or access the Website and its Services.
tandc_policy.content13: If you have any questions about this Agreement, please contact us.
tandc_policy.content14: This document was last updated on August 8, 2023

reservation_terms.title: Reservation Terms
reservation_terms.content2: Smart Stay Technologies LLC – contractually has right to accept bookings on behalf of the Operator, who legally manages the Property. Hereafter referred as "The Company"
reservation_terms.content3: Property – the Property mentioned in the Reservation Form.
reservation_terms.content4: Guest or Guests – any individual(s) or organization booking a Property from the Operator for temporary usage as a temporary home.
reservation_terms.content5: Operator - Company or entity that manages and operates various aspects in the property (i.e. hotel, restaurant). The operator overseas the day-to-day operations. The operator is also responsible for maintaining the overall Guest experience.
reservation_terms.content7: – Guests hereby agree to rent the premises (“Property”) for the length and at the rate designated on Reservation Form.
reservation_terms.content8: – Guests are granted a limited permission to occupy the Property for temporary accommodation purposes and usage only. This Reservation Terms & Housing Rules IS NOT a residential tenancy agreement and does not fall under the residential tenancy legislation(s).
reservation_terms.content9: – Guests shall not assign or sublet or grant any license to use the Property or any part thereof to any other party without the prior written consent of the Operator.
reservation_terms.content10: – All Guests or Visitors below 19 years old must be accompanied by Adults during check-in.
reservation_terms.content11: – Valid identification documents (such as Emirates ID and/or Passport) shall be presented in original during the check-in procedure by all Guests and Visitors, else no entry will be granted.
reservation_terms.content12: – Guests must be able to present the Credit/Debit card used for making the reservation online when checking in, for the payment to be accepted and validated.
reservation_terms.content13: – Failure to comply with the Guest’s obligations as set out in these Reservation Terms & Housing Rules may result in termination of permission to occupy the Property and immediate eviction of the Guest without further refunds.
reservation_terms.content15: Reservations and services are confirmed and guaranteed only upon:
reservation_terms.content16: (a) receipt of all outstanding payments including rent, security deposit and all fees and taxes in full;
reservation_terms.content17: (b) confirmation email sent by the Company or the Operator to the Guest with Booking/Reservation number and reservation details mentioned;
reservation_terms.content19: – Guests are required to pay/provide a Security Deposit as set by the Operator/this agreement prior to check-in. The Security Deposit will be collected prior to check-in and released back within 10-days after the departure (it can longer in certain cases whenever the Operator requires additional time to find a missing or damaged replacement item).
reservation_terms.content20: – The Security Deposit may be deducted automatically without notice by Operator at its sole discretion in order to:
reservation_terms.content21: (a) repair, replace or clean anything that is damaged or missing or stained item by the Guest/ Visitors inside the Property or outside such as the balcony, terrace, backyard, patio and/or neighbouring properties and to the Community/Common Areas;
reservation_terms.content22: (b) to replace all lost or damaged keys or access cards or remote controls;
reservation_terms.content23: (c) arrange additional cleaning for excessive dirt (i.e. stained carpets, sofas, furniture, walls, appliances or any other excessive waste left in the Property);
reservation_terms.content24: (d) arrange laundry or special cleaning in case of smoking or leaving bad odor;
reservation_terms.content25: (e) arrange disinfection with licensed company if the Guest and/or Visitors were identified or suspected to had COVID;
reservation_terms.content26: (f) to pay against penalties such as for smoking inside the Property, making party/noise during quiet hours, disturbing the neighbor or their properties, trespassing the security gate, conducting illegal or commercial activities or other penalties as imposed by Operator, Community Management, or other governing authority;
reservation_terms.content27: (g) for any video on demand, upgrade of the internet/cable channels and/or mobile/international calls made using Property’s internet/telephone line.
reservation_terms.content28: (h) pay against any services/items that the Guest/Visitors ordered via Operator during their stay.
reservation_terms.content29: (i) pay for unauthorized early check-in or late check-out charges or unreasonable delays/damages caused to the Operator and its staff for completing their day-to-day tasks.
reservation_terms.content30: If the collected Security Deposit amount shall not be sufficient to cover any/all of incurred charges as mentioned above, the Guest is fully responsible to immediately clear the remaining balance to the Operator to cover the shortfall.
reservation_terms.content32: – Room rates and service rates are inclusive of 5% VAT (value added tax);
reservation_terms.content33: – Tourism Dirham will be calculated for the first 30 consecutive nights of the Reservation.
reservation_terms.content34: – For long-stays each Reservation is valid for a minimum period of 1-month and maximum of 12 months
reservation_terms.content35: – Operator’s default currency is AED and should the guest pay using another currency then custom rates set out by the Operator shall apply.
reservation_terms.content36: – In case the Guest has wired money to the Operator’s bank account, Guest is responsible to cover upon check-in all bank fees such as missing amount due to bank processing or bank exchange rates.
reservation_terms.content38: – All rental payments, partial down-payments, reservation/booking and all other sort of service payments are non-refundable for any reason; all reservations are non-transferrable to any other party and non-amendable.
reservation_terms.content39: – In case of Cancellation, change request or no-show fee equivalent to the value of the entire stay will be levied by Operator.
reservation_terms.content40: – Security Deposit payment is fully refundable, subject to these terms and conditions.
reservation_terms.content41: – If the reservation is cancelled by the Operator for any reason then the entire amount will be refunded to the Guest with no other liabilities.
reservation_terms.content42: – Notwithstanding the foregoing, any loss, failure, or delay arising out of or related to the COVID-19 pandemic shall not constitute a force majeure event.
reservation_terms.content44: – Note that below violations will lead to immediate actions by Operator:
reservation_terms.content45: (a) Loud Music/Parties/unappropriated noise level after 10:00 PM (till 8am);
reservation_terms.content46: (b) Trespassing or Blocking security barrier/gate, illegal parking or swearing the Community or Operator’s staff;
reservation_terms.content48: (d) Illegal activities / disturbance, damage or illegal access or unauthorized access to/of the neighbour’s property/items/community;
reservation_terms.content49: (e) If residue of an animal is found during our inspection following checkout Guest will be assessed a minimum AED 2500 cleaning charge.
reservation_terms.content51: In any/all above cases security deposit will be forfeited and in case of repetition guests might be evicted.
reservation_terms.content53: – Guest agrees to indemnify and hold the Operator harmless for any liabilities including but not limited to loss, theft, damage to personal belongings OR injury, illness or sickness or death to Guests or Visitors. The Operator will not be liable under any circumstances, including substitutions, to refund any unused portion of booked accommodations or services. If a catastrophe (hurricane, tornado, earthquake, flood, fire, or wind) or any situation beyond Operator’s control impairs the vacation rental, Operator is not responsible for finding alternate lodging for the Guest or for the Guest’s financial losses related to transportation or alternate lodging. There will be NO REFUNDS OR CREDITS FOR EMERGENCY OR OTHER KIND OF EVACUATIONS.
reservation_terms.content54: – For such purposes it is advisable to have Travel Protection Insurance for all Guests. There will be no refunds or rebates given to Guest as a result of unfortunate circumstances outside of the Operator’s control. As such, Operator shall not be liable for unfavorable weather, acts of God, disruption of utility services, malfunction or breakdown of appliances, or other equipment(s) and services such as TV disruption of cable channels / internet / AC service / lights or restriction by government or community to use the pool / gym or other facilities; or for the time required to the contractors to fix/repair such issues. The Operator shall make repairs as expeditiously as possible after being notified by the Guest during standard working hours only (9:00am till 6:00pm) and subject to availability first.
reservation_terms.content56: Visitors – additional individual(s) invitees of the Guest who are visiting the Property, rather than staying overnight.

aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.para1: Hotel Apartments is a product of innovation, leadership, passion, and hard work with a mission to revolutionize corporate housing. Built on a sound foundation of property management, it is a marketplace for leisure and corporate travelers seeking flexible-stay, fully furnished, fully serviced apartments across the globe. By harnessing and integrating new technologies into our service delivery, we are providing our guests and members more comfortable and attractive stays in over 300 hotel and serviced apartment locations.
aboutus.para2: In 2019, Rafayel Papikyan & Artyom Meltonyan combined their real estate experience and decided to take the serviced apartment industry in the UAE to a whole new level by launching their company ServicedApartments.ae. With a vision of simplifying trip management, they founded Serviced Apartments to be an intuitive single platform that helped find the most suitable serviced apartments for vetted, closed networks of business and leisure travelers.
aboutus.para3: After three years of growth and expansion, in 2022 , R and A recognized an unmet need in major cities for corporate housing so they decided to take it up a notch. The duo combined their fully serviced hotel apartments business with corporate housing and created a solution that was much needed. That’s when HotelApartments.ae was born. By 2023, with over 1600 serviced apartments, HotelApartments.ae has accommodated over 5000 customers all over the world so far.
aboutus.para4: At HotelApartments.com, we've redefined the concept of fully serviced apartments to cater to the evolving needs of our guests, especially in the world of corporate housing. Our journey began with a deep understanding of flexible living arrangements, where comfort has always been non-negotiable. We have created exceptional living spaces that encompass the finest in design, wellness, and technology. Our reach now extends to 20 different cities, offering thoughtfully designed living spaces. Whether it's hotel apartments, villas, corporate housing, or even luxury penthouses, our brand is tailored to help people explore new places with complete services.
aboutus.para4_1: At HotelApartments.com, we're driven by our passion to redefine the concept of hospitality to a smart way of living in hotels and we are dedicated to embodying it in the years to come too.
aboutus.para5: Being one of the UAE’s fastest growing hospitality companies, HA has now expanded to 20 cities with a plan of growing to 12 more cities by 2025. HotelApartments.com has been on an impressive growth trajectory since we began, and it’s all fueled by our incredible team.
